ARTICLE.TITLE: Trump Celebrates Afghanistan Visit as Great
ARTICLE.TEXT:
KABUL - Soon after returning to the United States, President Donald Trump on Friday celebrated as great his surprise visit with American troops in Afghanistan.

In a tweet, he said: “Just returned to the United States after spending a GREAT Thanksgiving with our courageous warriors in Afghanistan!”

One of the photos he placed on his Twitter account show Trump addressing US soldiers in front of an enormous American flag, sitting at a table with service members.

News of Trump’s visit to Afghanistan came on Thursday evening, when journalists traveling with him were allowed to report on the trip.

An identical presidential aircraft remained in Florida at the airport while Trump flew to Afghanistan. That plane then flew to Germany on Thursday to pick up the president for the second leg of his trip back. (Pajhwok)
